-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Automated Mutation Testing for Hspec tests
--   
--   This package contains the test adapter for Hspec tests to use it with
--   MuCheck
@package MuCheck-Hspec
@version 0.3.0.4


-- | Module for using Hspec tests
module Test.MuCheck.TestAdapter.Hspec
type HspecSummary = Summary

-- | Summarizable instance of <a>Summary</a>
instance Typeable Summary
instance Summarizable HspecSummary
